text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 16- June 22, 2025, includes Hero Ball Season 3B, Expedition Unknown Season 15, Teen Titans Go! Season 9B, The Kitchen Season 38, and many others. On June 16, Hero Ball Season 3B will be released on HBO Max. The animated series showcases the competition between talented basketball players. They use their special powers to determine the best player in the land. Further, Expedition Unknown Season 15 drops on the streaming platform. The series chronicles the adventures of delving deep into the unknown places in the world. Whether it’s lost cities, unsolved events, or buried treasures, every mystery is worth exploring. Also coming out on HBO Max is Teen Titans Go! Season 9B releases on HBO Max. The fantasy animated series focuses on a team of superheroes fighting to save the world. Additionally, they end up facing comical situations while trying to stay together. Additionally, The Kitchen Season 38 will be available on the streaming platform. The cooking reality show follows the kitchen hosts preparing unique dishes while playing games and communicating with the audience. They also share interesting tips for a perfect family meal that will leave one charmed. New HBO Max releases for June 16- June 22, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 16 to June 22, 2025 Monday, June 16 Hero Ball, Season 3B Tuesday, June 17 Dr. Sanjay Gupta Reports: Animal Pharm (CNN Originals, 2025) Super Mega Cakes, Season 1 (Food Network) Thursday, June 19 Expedition Unknown, Season 15 (Discovery) Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch, Season 5 (Discovery) Friday, June 20 House Hunters: Volume 10, Season 241 (HGTV) Lu & The Bally Bunch, Season 1C (Cartoon Network) Now or Never: FC Montfermeil (Max Original) Teen Titans Go!, Season 9B (Cartoon Network) Saturday, June 21 The Kitchen, Season 38 (Food Network) The Never Ever Mets, Season 2 (OWN) Sunday, June 22 The Gilded Age, Season 3 (HBO Original) For more HBO Max content, check out an update on The Last of Us Season 3.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 16- June 22, 2025, includes Hero Ball Season 3B, Expedition Unknown Season 15, Teen Titans Go! Season 9B, The Kitchen Season 38, and many others.

On June 16, Hero Ball Season 3B will be released on HBO Max. The animated series showcases the competition between talented basketball players. They use their special powers to determine the best player in the land.

Further, Expedition Unknown Season 15 drops on the streaming platform. The series chronicles the adventures of delving deep into the unknown places in the world. Whether it’s lost cities, unsolved events, or buried treasures, every mystery is worth exploring.

Also coming out on HBO Max is Teen Titans Go! Season 9B releases on HBO Max. The fantasy animated series focuses on a team of superheroes fighting to save the world. Additionally, they end up facing comical situations while trying to stay together.

Additionally, The Kitchen Season 38 will be available on the streaming platform. The cooking reality show follows the kitchen hosts preparing unique dishes while playing games and communicating with the audience. They also share interesting tips for a perfect family meal that will leave one charmed.

New HBO Max releases for June 16- June 22, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 16 to June 22, 2025

Monday, June 16

  • Hero Ball, Season 3B

Tuesday, June 17

  • Dr. Sanjay Gupta Reports: Animal Pharm (CNN Originals, 2025)
  • Super Mega Cakes, Season 1 (Food Network)

Thursday, June 19

  • Expedition Unknown, Season 15 (Discovery)
  • Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch, Season 5 (Discovery)

Friday, June 20

  • House Hunters: Volume 10, Season 241 (HGTV)
  • Lu & The Bally Bunch, Season 1C (Cartoon Network)
  • Now or Never: FC Montfermeil (Max Original)
  • Teen Titans Go!, Season 9B (Cartoon Network)

Saturday, June 21

  • The Kitchen, Season 38 (Food Network)
  • The Never Ever Mets, Season 2 (OWN)

Sunday, June 22

  • The Gilded Age, Season 3 (HBO Original)

For more HBO Max content, check out an update on The Last of Us Season 3.
